ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but also that My punishment is the Painful Punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But My punishment is surely a painful one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: At the same time, My chastisement is highly painful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and that My punishment is a painful one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that indeed the punishment of Mine is a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that My torment is indeed the most painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that My punishment-- that is the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that My chastisement is the painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that My doom is the dolorous doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and that My punishment is a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily My torment! that is the torment afflictive
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and that My punishment is a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And that My Penalty will be indeed the most grievous Penalty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that My Torment is indeed the most painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that My punishment is the painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that My punishment is the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:50] and that My chastisement, of those who are disobedient, is the painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that My doom is the dolorous doom) the painful doom for the one who does not repent and dies in a state of disbelief.
